author: kfogel
msg: Inhibit Emacs auto-backup for files under svn control:
(svn-find-file-hook): New func, add it to find-file-hooks.

author: cmpilato
msg: More commit fixes.  This should make *all* commit tests pass over
parameters.  We don't open directory batons that get deleted, so our
last opened directory url is a deleted dir's parent.  Also, open
Insignificant formatting or minor logic changes.
(svn_client_commit): Abort edits that were interrupted by errors.
Also, make sure that any non-new directories with propmods are
up-to-date before committing.  Update call to svn_client__do_commit.
(svn_wc_transmit_text_deltas): Bug fix (thanks to GStein for finding
this a couple of weeks ago)
(get_log_msg): If the user chooses to C)ontinue, we want an empty
log message, not a NULL one, returned.

author: kfogel
msg: Organizationally, libsvn_wc is a mess :-).  It needs clearly defined
internal submodules, the way libsvn_fs has.  Doing so would make other
things (such as Issue 549, checksumming text-bases) easier.
This change puts log-related stuff into a submodule, and is the first
* wc.h: Moved all log-related symbols to new header log.h below...
* log.h: New file, now publishes these symbols:
